Name: Eliminate court, probation, and parole surcharges and fees as well as prohibit mandatory minimum fines for penal and vehicle and traffic laws (S.00313/A.04183).
Title: Resolution calling on the New York Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.00313/A.04183, which would eliminate court, probation, and parole surcharges and fees as well as prohibit mandatory minimum fines for penal and vehicle and traffic laws

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
